channel.title: 317 [PI] Need help
channel.description:
Hello,
i want to change a few things or fix them:
1) Prayer I want to change some sprites of prayer and i changed them but now if i see them in game with a white background, than i came with the solution to extract an other prayer image and than give my prayer sprites the same background but that didn`t work.
I want to write text in the square i made with paint, see pic below [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/6r4rxs.png[/img]
An other thing is the piety that i changed to an other place is to heigh, see pic below [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2hs24k5.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2) Loading please wait
I wanted to change the loading please wait i have with an other loading please wait,i want that to for connection lost, see pic below [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2817l1i.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3) Options
My run is everytime 0% and if the button isn`t red what means that you are walking it is still running? And my brightness doesn`t have a button or something if i login, but if i click lightest brightness i see it. If i relog it keeps like that but than i close client and look at my brightness it is again like on the pic, see pic below [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/24y4e9s.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So if anybody can helpme i would appreciate that
Peace
------------------------------------------------------------- If it is in the wrong section, correct me please ;) -------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: 317 [PI] Need help
item.dc:creator: @TheGodzGang TheGodzGang
item.description:
@TheGodzGang wrote:

Hello,

i want to change a few things or fix them:

  1. Prayer
    I want to change some sprites of prayer and i changed them but now if i see them in game with a white background, than i came with the solution to extract an other prayer image and than give my prayer sprites the same background but that didn`t work.

I want to write text in the square i made with paint, see pic below

An other thing is the piety that i changed to an other place is to heigh, see pic below

  1. Loading please wait

I wanted to change the loading please wait i have with an other loading please wait,i want that to for connection lost, see pic below

  1. Options

My run is everytime 0% and if the button isnt red what means that you are walking it is still running? And my brightness doesnt have a button or something if i login, but if i click lightest brightness i see it.
If i relog it keeps like that but than i close client and look at my brightness it is again like on the pic, see pic below

So if anybody can helpme i would appreciate that

Peace

If it is in the wrong section, correct me please
